name: Reliance Smart
description: A one-stop destination for all your grocery needs, offering a wide range of products at competitive prices.

reviews.comment: Great variety of products and excellent service. Convenient location.
Good shopping experience overall. Prices are reasonable.

name: Big Bazaar
address: Alpha One Mall, Plot No.216, T.P. Scheme-1, Near Vaishno Devi Circle, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382421
description: A popular supermarket chain offering a wide range of groceries, electronics, apparel, and more.

reviews.comment: Huge store with a variety of products. Prices are reasonable.
Good place for shopping. Could improve on staff responsiveness.

name: D Mart
address: Plot No. 10, Near Dev Arc Mall, S.G. Road, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382421
description: A popular supermarket chain known for its affordable prices and a wide selection of products.

reviews.comment: Affordable prices and good variety. Convenient location.
Decent shopping experience. Could improve on cleanliness.

name: Vishal Mega Mart
address: Uma Nagar Society, Sector 11, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382011
description: A leading retail chain offering a wide range of products including apparel, groceries, electronics, and more.

reviews.comment: Good place for budget shopping. Has all the essentials.
Average experience. Could improve on customer service.

name: Patel Super Mart
description: A local favorite for grocery shopping, offering fresh produce and a variety of household items.

reviews.comment: Good quality products and friendly staff. Convenient location.
Decent store for everyday shopping. Prices are reasonable.

name: Spar Hypermarket
address: 10th Floor, Alpha One Mall, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380015
description: A large hypermarket offering a wide range of products including groceries, apparel, electronics, and more.

reviews.comment: Great shopping experience. Huge selection of products.
Good place for bulk shopping. Prices are competitive.

name: Easyday Club
address: 2nd Floor, Shivshakti Complex, Sector 22, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382022
description: A membership-based retail store offering discounts on a wide range of products including groceries and household items.

reviews.comment: Convenient store with good discounts for members. Staff is helpful.
Membership benefits are good. Could improve on product variety.

name: Adani Mart
description: A growing retail chain offering a variety of products at affordable prices.

reviews.comment: Good shopping experience. Prices are reasonable.
Decent store for everyday shopping. Could improve on cleanliness.

name: More Supermarket
address: Ground Floor, Near Gh-0 Circle, Sector-16, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382016
description: A popular supermarket chain offering a wide range of groceries, personal care products, and household items.

reviews.comment: Great variety of products and good discounts. Convenient location.
Good shopping experience overall. Prices are competitive.

name: HyperCITY
address: Ahmedabad One, Near Vastrapur Lake, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380015
description: A large hypermarket offering a wide range of products including groceries, electronics, apparel, and more.
